name: Dandy Box w/ Metal Side
description: The Dandy Box is a chic accent piece for your home. The piece is lined with a removable velvet tray should one wish to use it for jewelry. The piece is inlaid in a mixture of shagreen or shell, with the sides completely in bronze-patina brass. This piece comes in 2 sizes. Handmade in shagreen, shell, and bronze-patina brass. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in the Philippines.
